Title: Scorched
Writer: Joe Wein, Joe Wein (story), Max Wein (story)
Actors: Alicia Silverstone, Rachael Leigh Cook, Woody Harrelson, John Cleese
Plot: Three mischievous employees of a bank in a small deserted town all make plans to rob at the same time, however none of them knows about the others. Meanwhile, a clothing store employee has plans for revenge against a local millionaire.
